tool_description: Reliable Airports list and details, with IATA codes.
name: World IATA Airports
title: World IATA Airports

api_list.name: /airports
api_list.description: Return a list with all airports with IATA codes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airports-iata.p.rapidapi.com/airports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports-iata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /airports/{iataCode}
api_list.description: Get the details of an airport by IATA code.

required_parameters.name: iatacode
required_parameters.description: A three letters Airport IATA code.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airports-iata.p.rapidapi.com/airports/LAX"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports-iata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airports-iata.p.rapidapi.com/airports/{iatacode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports-iata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
